fr.theshark34.supdate

Class SUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.theshark34.supdate.SUpdate

  • public class SUpdate
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class

    Initialize it with the url of the update folder and the output folder to start updating !
